item.title: Industrial Smoke and Chemical Sensors Process Control
item.description: This article will help you understand and become familiar with other sensors that play a very important part in process control, but may not be encountered on a daily basis. The following are covered in this article: ■ Position, distance, velocity, and acceleration sensors ■ Rotation sensors using light and Hall effect sensors ■ Force, torque, load cells, and balances ■ Smoke detectors, gas, and chemical sensors in the industry
